summary: Two pieces of NASA's Gateway program—the first space station to orbit the moon—are scheduled to launch together in 2027. NASA is taking steps to ensure Gateway will be ready. For example, the program plans to update a cost and schedule analysis that will help determine whether the launch date is feasible. But this program also faces some significant challenges. For example, the mass of the...
title: Artemis Programs: NASA Should Document and Communicate Plans to Address Gateway's Mass Risk
